Others: Joel Embiid became involved in a physical altercation with a local columnist in the team’s locker room post-game.
The columnist had written an opinion piece on Embiid that many fans found unfair, mentioning Embiid’s son and deceased younger brother.
Embiid confronted the columnist verbally and physically in the locker room, leading to a brief physical altercation.
Team security intervened, and players surrounded the situation to disperse it.
The NBA is investigating the matter, marking the second time in the season the league has investigated the Philadelphia 76ers.
